resources.string: If you tap on EVENTS, you\'ll see a list of all the events the person created. If he/she has any private or exclusive events, then those events will be invisible to you if your not on their guest list. If this is your profile, than you\'ll have the option of deleting events, by tapping on the trash can.
Tapping on GUESTS will show you everyone on that person\'s guest list
Tapping on HOSTS will show you all of the people hosting that person.

Tapping the HOST BUTTON will ADD the person to your guest list. That means he/she will see all of your current and future private events. They will NOT be able to see your exclusive events unless invited first.
Tapping the HOSTING BUTTON will REMOVE the person from your guest list and they will no longer be able to see any of your private or exclusive events.
If you have anymore questions regarding the app, tweet us @hiikeyapp or on our facebook page at facbook.com/hiikey.
